Texts.Chs:
> 飞船推进器当前处于离线状态。
> 飞船传送系统正常运作。
> ^green;目前只能抵达飞船下方的星球。
Texts.Eng:
> Ship thrusters are currently offline.
> Ship teleportation system functioning correctly.
> ^green;Currently only the planet below is accessible.

Texts.Chs:
> 飞船推进器已上线。
> FTL引擎已上线。
> 飞船传送系统正常运作。
> ^green;可以抵达整个宇宙。
Texts.Eng:
> Ship thrusters are online.
> FTL drive is online.
> Ship teleportation system functioning correctly.
> ^green;The entire universe is accessible.

Texts.Chs:
> 飞船推进器已上线。
> FTL引擎已上线。
> 飞船传送系统正常运作。
> ^green;可以抵达这个恒星系中的所有星球。
Texts.Eng:
> Ship thrusters are online.
> Ship teleportation system functioning correctly.
> ^green;Planets within this star system are accessible.

Texts.Chs:
发生了一个错误。请在Steam页面或Discord服务器上报告此事，并附上日志。^green;如果下面的错误信息是绿色的，你应该注意它。^reset;

同时，你可以点击任何一个按钮来打开原版SAIL。
Texts.Eng:
An error has occured. Please report this on the Steam page or Discord server with a log attached. ^green;If the error message below is green, you should pay attention to it.^reset;

Meanwhile, you can click any of the buttons to open the vanilla version of SAIL.

Texts.Chs:
在下面的插槽中插入人工智能芯片以定制A.I.。

单击“^green;CRAFT^reset;”按钮来打开A.I.芯片的制作菜单.
Texts.Eng:
Insert A.I. chips in the slots below to customize the A.I.
Click the '^green;CRAFT^reset;' button to open the A.I. chip crafting menu.

Texts.Chs: 目前没有任何可行的任务坐标。

目前没有不活跃的船员。

如果活跃船员的数量超过你可以容纳的船员数量，活跃船员就会变成不活跃的船员。
Texts.Eng:
There are currently no inactive crew members.

Crew members become inactive if the the number of active crew exceeds the number of crew your ship can support.

Texts.Chs:
欢迎使用S.A.I.L.

使用这个界面，你可以检查飞船状态，查看^green;[余额]^reset;，开始^green;[任务]^reset;，管理^green;[船员]^reset;)，并访问其他一些有用的^green;[杂项]^reset;功能。
Texts.Eng:
Welcome to S.A.I.L.

Using this interface you can check the ship's status, view your currency ^green;[BALANCE]^reset;, begin ^green;[MISSIONS]^reset;, manage your ^green;[CREW]^reset;, and access other useful ^green;[MISC]^reset; features.

Texts.Chs:
你是这艘飞船唯一的在籍船员。

招募额外的船员可有助于提高运作效率。
Texts.Eng:
You are the only registered crew member of this ship.

Recruiting additional crew members may allow for increased operational efficiency.

Texts.Chs: customDataPromise失败 - 不兼容或有问题的SAIL对象定义。请与制作你当前种族的修改者联系，并向他们说明他们的techStation对象定义有问题。
Texts.Eng: customDataPromise failed - Incompatible or faulty SAIL object definition. Please contact the modder who made your current race about a fault in their techStation object definition.
